comments:
On page three the default for the module and project are the same for for the 
service and the client.  For the client I kept the project the same and changed 
the module name of something different.  When I do this the wizard throws the 
following exception when clicking next to the client page.


Path must include project and resource name: /MyProj4

We no longer allow service and client projects to be the same. Since the 
generated java files will conflict and cause compile errors.

The 3rd page of the wizard disables Next and Finish if the proper conditions 
for project and module name are not met.
i.e. 
1. Project names must be different. (Class name collision)
2. Module names must be different. (Not supported by servers)
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
Verified that this is fixed in the I20050628 driver.

traces.message: Path must include project and resource  name: /MyProj4
